short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Message safely! Don't let anyone know you are typing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Most people don't like to be watched. So I made a plugin that hides your writing status for discord. You will no longer appear as typing when you click on the message box by mistake!

Technically this plugin doesnt manipulate discord client. It just block the typing request.

Github: https://github.com/fishuke/safe-typer
